We refreshed our look, attitude and functionality for a faster & smarter Redbox experience. We fully fused our Redbox Perks loyalty program into the app so you can always keep up with your points. And now you can watch Redbox On Demand right on your iPhone.

Bug fixes and enhancements
Bug fixes and enhancements

With release 7.6, you can now link your Redbox account with your Facebook and Google accounts to sign in. We’ve also made it easier to find release dates for upcoming movies and TV shows. Just tap on a movie or TV show in Upcoming to see when it will be available at the Box and On Demand. This update also includes bug fixes and improvements.

With release 7.6, you can now link your Redbox account with your Facebook and Google accounts to sign in. We’ve also made it easier to find release dates for upcoming movies and TV shows. Just tap on a movie or TV show in Upcoming to see when it will be available at the Box and On Demand. This update also includes bug fixes and improvements.
You can now download On Demand rentals in the app and watch them in offline mode. We’ve also added more content to Home and made it easier to browse On Demand movies and TV shows.
You can now download On Demand rentals in the app and watch them in offline mode. We’ve also added more content to Home and made it easier to browse On Demand movies and TV shows.

Bug Fixes.
We’ve updated the look and feel of Redbox Perks and made it easier to check your points balance, tier benefits, and usage history. We also fixed a few bugs and crashes.
Winter Spin is now live! Play in the app through December 16th.

Fixed a bug where users were unintentionally signed out, and resolved a crash related to Chromecast.

Made it easier for Perks members to redeem points when reserving. Just tap “Use Points” on the checkout screen.
Made it easier for Perks members to redeem points when reserving. Just tap “Use Points” on the checkout screen.
We update our app regularly so that way we can make it better for you.  This app release includes performance improvements and bug fixes that make the app launch faster.
We update our app regularly so that way we can make it better for you.  This app release includes performance improvements and bug fixes that make the app launch faster.

We noticed a few users were having trouble with credit cards on Checkout and found a couple related bugs that are now fixed. We also fixed a bug preventing On Demand users from deleting queued downloads.

We noticed a few users were having trouble with credit cards on Checkout and found a couple related bugs that are now fixed. We also fixed a bug preventing On Demand users from deleting queued downloads.
We fixed a bug on our end that was preventing some of you from using points when checking out.

We frequently update our app to make renting, watching, and playing movies and games easier. This release includes fixes for a few bugs and crashes, and we corrected some layout issues on devices with smaller screens.

We’ve made it easier to view and use the promo codes you’ve earned for being a Perks member! Just tap on My Redbox and sign in to see your promos, or tap on “Apply Promos” when reserving to easily add a code to your cart.

Badges are here! As a Redbox Perks member, you can take on fun challenges and earn serious bragging rights. Superstars and Legends also get extra points for each badge earned. Check them out on the My Redbox tab, and share your achievements with your friends. Enjoying Redbox Perks? Now you can refer others and earn extra points when they sign up and rent!

We improved video quality for downloaded movies and TV shows, and we fixed a bug where transaction history wasn’t showing for some users. As a reminder, you can always view your previous transactions by going to the My Redbox tab, tapping on the Account icon, and selecting “Transaction History”.
